definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: After the football match, the players turned in their uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 这场足球比赛之后，队员们把运动衣归还。

sentences.english: Any gaps in the sequence will indicate the books that have not yet been returned.
sentences.chinese: 顺序号中的任何间隔将表示尚未归还的图书。

sentences.english: Ron lent me the money on condition that I pay it back next month.
sentences.chinese: 岁恩把钱借给我，条件是下月归还。

sentences.english: When did he return the book to the library?
sentences.chinese: 从图书馆借出来的书都盖上了归还的截止日期。

sentences.english: The landlords who live in mansions want to have their lands returned.
sentences.chinese: 生活在别墅里的地主们要求归还他们的土地。

sentences.english: I've come to reclaim my property, " she announced to the desk clerk."
sentences.chinese: 䵑“我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentences.english: Trun in all the tools after use.
sentences.chinese: 全部工具用后都要归还。

sentences.english: Four years later Bumpton returned the painting voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 4年后坎普顿主动归还了画作。

sentences.english: Estonia reclaimed its independence and seceded from the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 爱沙尼亚要求归还其独立权并退出苏维埃联盟。

sentences.english: A rainforest restoration project in southern China is engulfed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 中国南部的归还热带雨林计划遭火海吞没。

sentences.english: Gail kept her word and returned all the money.
sentences.chinese: 盖尔履行了她的诺言，把钱如数归还。

sentences.english: Please provide tools for untieing and lashings. We'll return them to you after using.
sentences.chinese: 请你提供捆扎工具，使用完毕立即归还。

sentences.english: All I could say was that any unlawful contributions should be returned immediately.
sentences.chinese: 所有我能说的是，任何不合法的捐赠都必须立刻归还。

sentences.english: The property returned to the original owner.
When the lease ends, the property reverts to the freeholder.
sentences.chinese: 租期结束后，该房产会归还给其终身所有者。

sentences.english: A decision to restitute gold requires support from an 85 percent majority of the total voting power.
sentences.chinese: 归还黄金要求得到总投票权的85%的票数支持。

definition: restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to return something to its rightful owner
to take for one's own/to expropriate
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to regain/to retake/to take back/to withdraw/to revoke
to recover (sth lost or stolen)/to get back
to demand payment of money owing
